alert.note: Alert for Monroe (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 24 at 12:00PM CST until January 26 at 8:00AM CST by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River near Amory ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Mississippi... Tombigbee River at Bigbee For the Tombigbee River...including Bigbee and Amory...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON TO FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tombigbee River near Amory. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon to Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Lowland flooding begins. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:15 AM CST Wednesday the stage was 11.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage early tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 20.4 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage early Friday morning. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued late Thursday night at midnight CST.
